participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
i am married with 2 children.
i am the youngest in my family.
i always eat my vegetables.
I'm not a wealthy man, but I have enough to enjoy the things that I love, like traveling with my dog.

participant_2.background:
I pilot my plane to the best wineries in the world to sample their best vintages.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
I sometimes donate a portion of my art sales to animal welfare organizations without telling my parents.
i go to craft shows on the weekends.
I am going to stay home and relax this weekend.

content.text: Hello! I'm a teacher and I'm looking for ways to use technology in the classroom. Do you have any suggestions?
Hi there! I'm an artist and I often use technology in my work. I'm also a pilot and I use technology to help me navigate my plane.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
It's a lot of fun! I love being up in the air and seeing the world from a different perspective.
I'm sure you've seen some amazing things!
I have! I've seen mountains, oceans, forests, and cities. It's really a beautiful world.
It sounds like you have a really exciting life!
I do! I'm grateful for every day.
Thanks! I hope you have a wonderful day.
